author: gpetruc
body:
The maxi cleanup of the event in #11068 content dropped also the no-HF MET from MiniAOD by mistake.
For 76X, the mistake is already done and probably not so bad since the recommendation is to use the full MET anyway. 
However, for 80X it's safer to add back the no-HF in case we will have more surprises at the 2016 startup.
title: Recover metNoHF (was dropped by mistake in #11068)
